name: Tavily Search
description: Web tools via Tavily API. Provides tavily_search, tavily_extract, tavily_crawl, tavily_map, and tavily_research tools for search, content extraction, website crawling, site mapping, and deep research.

apiKey.description: Tavily API key (defaults to TAVILY_API_KEY env var)

searchDepth.description: Search depth: ultra-fast, fast, basic, or advanced (thorough). Default: advanced

includeAnswer.description: Include an AI-generated short answer. Boolean or 'basic'/'advanced'. Default: true

includeRawContent.description: Include raw page content. Boolean or 'markdown'/'text'. Default: false

timeoutSeconds.description: Timeout in seconds for search requests. Default: 30

searchDepth.label: Search Depth
searchDepth.help: ultra-fast and fast are cheapest; advanced is slowest but most thorough.

includeAnswer.label: Include AI Answer
includeAnswer.help: true/false, or 'basic'/'advanced' for answer quality tier.

includeRawContent.label: Include Raw Content
includeRawContent.help: true/false, or 'markdown'/'text' for format. Increases token usage.

cacheTtlMinutes.label: Cache TTL (minutes)
cacheTtlMinutes.help: How long to cache results. Set 0 to disable.
